articles.description: Missy Elliott and Queen Latifah were among the National Medal of Arts Recipients at a White House ceremony on Monday (Oct. 21).

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein Diagnosed With Cancer - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The disgraced movie mogul and convicted rapist has suffered a number of health problems in recent years.
articles.content:
Harvey Weinstein has been diagnosed with cancer, the latest in a slew of headlines related to the disgraced film producer’s health this fall. 
Weinstein has chronic myeloid leukemia, NBC News report… [+1191 chars]
